title: Gatsby and Lolita - Title Page Fonts
content:
Hi,

Can anyone identify the original typefaces used on these first edition title pages of Lolita and The Great Gatsby? (see images attached)

I would also like suggestions of similar typefaces that I can find access to today if the original typefaces are now obsolete.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Lolita.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821154911/http:/typophile.com/files/Lolita_0.jpg) | 52.44 KB |
| [GreatGatsby.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821154911/http:/typophile.com/files/GreatGatsby.jpg) | 100.95 KB |
author: junia119

comments.content: Gatsby is some version of Caslon
